turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does the starbucks near me have the skinny mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Searching starbucks near you. I see one on A1A at Target, do you need directions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, can I place an order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can take care of that for you. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The skinny mocha, can I add whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, any other customizations?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get it with 2% milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I can place that for you. What size would you prefer? Tall, Grande, or Venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll go ahead and get that for you now. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, when will it be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will take 10 minutes for pick-up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, ordering now. I will charge your starbucks card ending in 3433.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order placed. Your confirmation # is 45464.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, on my way now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy your Venti skinny mocha with 2% milk and whip cream. fLet me know if you need anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm always available for your assistance.
